channel.title: Please Help! :)
channel.description:
Hello,
For MY Server I Really Wanna Get A Countdown Timer Like 20-30sec Before And Update/Restart. Is It Possible? AS MY Server Doesn't Save Character Often To Save Lag.
If You find A Program/Command Can You Comment To Link
Many Thanks
~ Jamie

item.title: Please Help! :)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

owner Jamie:

i know what file im meant to put in just dont know how to add it in it… :S please help want me to upload the commands.java?

Copy
Pasta

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help! :)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“owner Jamie, post:6, topic:423310”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=525956.msg3830086#msg3830086 date=1322502521]

  1. Remove your link; no advertising allowed.
  2. Saving characters should not produce noticeable lag.
  3. There’s a packet for notifying the players of an update on the server (http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:System_update)

so is it not possible to add the my server?

im on there but i cannot find a download or a command please help. thanks for help btw

There’s no download, or a command. It’s the data, about the packet, that notifies players of an upcoming update.
[/quote][/quote]

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:3, topic:423310”]so go to ur commands.java and add this in there

if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("UserName Here")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
to make it 20-30 secs, use this way.

::update 20
or ::update 30

Np…[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“owner Jamie, post:4, topic:423310”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=525956.msg3830071#msg3830071 date=1322501954]

  1. Remove your link; no advertising allowed.
  2. Saving characters should not produce noticeable lag.
  3. There’s a packet for notifying the players of an update on the server (http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:System_update)
    [/quote]

im on there but i cannot find a download or a command please help. thanks for help btw[/quote]

There’s no download, or a command. It’s the data, about the packet, that notifies players of an upcoming update.

item.title: Please Help! :)
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

so go to ur commands.java and add this in there

if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("UserName Here")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
to make it 20-30 secs, use this way.

::update 20
or ::update 30

Np…
